name: Kernel Upgrader
tagline: Bash Script to Upgrade Your Kernel
body:
### Welcome Kernel Upgrader Project
This is simple bash script to update your kernel to the latest kernel version on www.kernel.org.

### How To Use
```
$ git clone git@github.com:omegahanggara/kernel-upgrader.git
$ cd kernel-upgrader
$ bash src/kernel-upgrader.sh
```

### Authors and Contributors
In 2013 @omegahanggara with @krisanalfa

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the script? Send us email to hanggara33@gmail.com or krisan47@gmail.com
